title: Five Ways Muni Investors Can Navigate a Rising-Rate Environment
sub_head: Options for navigating the $4 trillion market for state and local government bonds
body:
Investors checking the value of their municipal-bond portfolios are getting bad news.
With the Federal Reserve rate increase earlier this month and expectations of more increases, municipal-bond prices have grown increasingly volatile, and the Bloomberg Municipal Bond Index has been down 46 of 57 trading days so far this year. Before 2022, that hadn’t happened since the index’s inception in 2001.
